meanings.sent1: The preinaugural speech set the tone for the upcoming ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The preinaugural events included a parade and a concert.
meanings.sent3: The preinaugural decorations were so extravagant that they outshone the main event.
meanings.sent4: The preinaugural excitement filled the air with anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The preinaugural preparations were meticulous and grand.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the period before an inauguration.
meanings.sent1: The preinaugural activities brought the community together in celebration.
meanings.sent2: The preinaugural committee worked tirelessly to ensure a smooth transition.
meanings.sent3: The preinaugural rush to finalize details caused some humorous mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: The preinaugural chaos mirrored the excitement of a bustling marketplace.
meanings.sent5: The preinaugural atmosphere buzzed with anticipation and hope.
